traps.misconception: DOM changes always trigger full page rerender
traps.correction: Only affected elements and their paint layers re-render
traps.explanation: Browser optimizes by only repainting changed regions and promoting elements to separate layers

traps.misconception: CSS animations are always GPU accelerated
traps.correction: Only transform and opacity animations use GPU by default
traps.explanation: Other properties like width, height, top, left trigger layout and paint on main thread
